meanings.definition: To become greater in size, amount, or degree.
meanings.sent1: The cake will greaten as it bakes in the oven.
meanings.sent2: I hope my muscles greaten with regular exercise.
meanings.sent3: Watching the balloon greaten as it fills with air is quite fascinating.
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to greaten the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The anticipation of the surprise party continued to greaten throughout the day.

meanings.definition: To make greater in size, amount, or degree.
meanings.sent1: She will greaten her savings by putting aside a portion of her allowance each week.
meanings.sent2: Adding more spices will greaten the flavor of the soup.
meanings.sent3: The magician attempted to greaten the rabbit in his hat, but it remained the same size.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed greatened with each obstacle he overcame.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brushstrokes seemed to greaten the beauty of the landscape painting.
